doc: The pathname to the SDF or ACC Zmatrix file containing the chemical system to work with.
The pathname of the input file containing the second chemical entity to work with (SDF or ACC's ZMatrix) when working with multiple ZMatrixes.
The pathname to the file where to print the ZMatrix.
Pathname to ACC's ZMatrix used as template when generating ZMatrix for other, consistent molecular systems.
Requests to use only torsions as 3rd internal coordinate in ZMatrix.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
